title: Remove hero stats for experience and projects completed

requirements.text: Remove the "Experience" and "Projects completed" stats/metrics from the website hero section so they are no longer visible anywhere on the page.

quotes: Yes but can you remove the expereience part and projects completed part?

acceptanceCriteria: The homepage hero no longer displays the labels "Experience" or "Completed" (nor the paired stats such as "5+" years and "50+" projects).
Hero section layout remains visually balanced on mobile and desktop after the stats removal (no awkward empty spacing or misalignment).
No other marketing sections (Services, Process, FAQ, Contact), header, or footer content is removed or changed unintentionally.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Do not add new hero statistics or replacement content unless explicitly requested.
Do not change backend inquiry APIs or contact form behavior.
